items.title: bulbasaur
items.description: A strange seed was planted on its back at birth. The plant sprouts and grows with this POKéMON.

items.title: ivysaur
items.description: When the bulb on its back grows large, it appears to lose the ability to stand on its hind legs.

items.title: venusaur
items.description: The plant blooms when it is absorbing solar energy. It stays on the move to seek sunlight.

items.title: charmander
items.description: Obviously prefers hot places. When it rains, steam is said to spout from the tip of its tail.

items.title: charmeleon
items.description: When it swings its burning tail, it elevates the temperature to unbearably high levels.

items.title: charizard
items.description: Spits fire that is hot enough to melt boulders. Known to cause forest fires unintentionally.

items.title: squirtle
items.description: Shoots water at prey while in the water. Withdraws into its shell when in danger.

items.title: wartortle
items.description: When tapped, this POKéMON will pull in its head, but its tail will still stick out a little bit.

items.title: blastoise
items.description: It deliberately makes itself heavy so it can with­ stand the recoil of the water jets it fires.

items.title: caterpie
items.description: It releases a stench from its red antenna to repel enemies. It grows by molting repeatedly.

items.title: metapod
items.description: This POKéMON is vulnerable to attack while its shell is soft, exposing its weak and tender body.

items.title: butterfree
items.description: In battle, it flaps its wings at high speed to release highly toxic dust into the air.

items.title: weedle
items.description: Often found in forests, eating leaves. It has a sharp venomous stinger on its head.

items.title: kakuna
items.description: Almost incapable of moving, this POKéMON can only harden its shell to protect itself from predators.

items.title: beedrill
items.description: Flies at high speed and attacks using its large venomous stingers on its forelegs and tail.

items.title: pidgey
items.description: A common sight in forests and woods. It flaps its wings at ground level to kick up blinding sand.

items.title: pidgeotto
items.description: Very protective of its sprawling territorial area, this POKéMON will fiercely peck at any intruder.

items.title: pidgeot
items.description: When hunting, it skims the surface of water at high speed to pick off unwary prey such as MAGIKARP.

items.title: rattata
items.description: Bites anything when it attacks. Small and very quick, it is a common sight in many places.
